A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Spoilers. Sloppy and disappointing. What happened to the knights of Ren\, snook’s origin\, Rey’s origin\, captain phasma? Bad bad storyline for Luke. Watched it twice coz I couldn’t believe what I saw the first time. Had to watch it again to make sure i wasn’t stupid to have missed all those stories that were set up in force awakens and unceremoniously dropped in this one. Where the heck is the lore master for these films?
